item.title: Liberal-NDP Break Up: The Commie Coalition is No More [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 12, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty discuss the recent Canadian COVID news, the recent dissolution of the NDP-Liberal "supply and confidence" coalition, and Wokism's lust for death and destruction.

Segment 1 - (COVID) News Brief:
“Canadian Pastor Celebrates Paying Off $300K in COVID Fines for Refusing to Close Church” | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/canadian-pastor-celebrates-paying-off-300k-in-covid-fines-for-refusing-to-close-church;
“Supreme Court Declines to Hear COVID Vaccine Travel Mandate Cases” | Justice Centre for Constitutional Freedoms (JCCF): https://www.jccf.ca/supreme-court-declines-to-hear-covid-vaccine-travel-mandate-cases; 
“Supreme Court of Canada Refuses to Hear High-Profile Cases Against COVID Mandates” | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/supreme-court-of-canada-refuses-to-hear-high-profile-cases-against-covid-mandates; 
“COVID-19 Summer Surge 2024” | The Hill: https://thehill.com/opinion/healthcare/4850579-covid-19-summer-surge-2024; 
Meta Letter from August 2024: https://prod-i.a.dj.com/public/resources/documents/meta-letter-082024.pdf; 
Tweet by @canindependent: https://x.com/canindependent/status/1829718661256331598;

Segment 2:
“Breaking: NDP Leader Jagmeet Singh Pulls Support from Trudeau’s Liberals” | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/breaking-ndp-leader-jagmeet-singh-pulls-support-from-trudeaus-liberals;
“Fildebrandt: Jagmeet & Justin Break Up” | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/canadian/fildebrandt-jagmeet-justin-break-up/57534; 
“Breaking: Pierre Poilievre Responds to NDP Breaking Confidence Agreement with Trudeau Liberals, Calls for Carbon Tax Election Now” | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/breaking-pierre-poilievre-responds-to-ndp-breaking-confidence-agreement-with-trudeau-liberals-calls-for-carbon-tax-election-now?utm_content=;
Tweet by @WeAreCanProud: https://x.com/WeAreCanProud/status/1830562565665235091;
“Breaking: Coutts Two Sentenced to Prison” | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/breaking_coutts_two_sentenced_to_prison;
Tweet by @KatKanada_TM: https://x.com/KatKanada_TM/status/1829732538828431816; 

Segment 3:
“Ontario School Calls Child Protective Services After Parents Object to Secret Gender Transition of Daughter” | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/ontario-school-calls-child-protective-services-after-parents-object-to-secret-gender-transition-of-daughter; 
“Canadian Pastor Convicted of Criminal Harassment for Opposing Drag Queen Story Hours” | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-pastor-convicted-of-criminal-harassment-for-opposing-drag-queen-story-hours; 
“Toronto Police Superintendent Demoted After Being Found Guilty of Cheating to Get Minority Cops Promoted” | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/toronto-police-superintendent-demoted-after-being-found-guilty-of-cheating-to-get-minority-cops-promoted; 
“Professor: If You Read to Your Kids, You’re Unfairly Disadvantaging Others” | National Review: https://www.nationalreview.com/2015/05/professor-if-you-read-your-kids-youre-unfairly-disadvantaging-others-katherine-timpf; 
“Elon Musk, Pronatalism, and JD Vance: Is Having More Kids Key to Economic Growth or a Ponzi Scheme?” | Fortune: https://fortune.com/2024/08/31/elon-musk-pronatalism-jd-vance-more-kids-economic-growth-ponzi-scheme;

item.title: LD DIALOGUE: Bruce Pardy & Andrew DeBartolo - The "Liberty" People v. The "Virtue" People [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 06, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, host Andrew DeBartolo sat down with Law professor Bruce Pardy to discuss the difference between what he calls the "virtue people" and the "liberty people." You're not going to want to miss this extended discussion on law, liberty, and ethics. Enjoy!

Episode Resources:
Rights Probe Website: https://www.rightsprobe.org/;
"Anatomy of the Administrative State" | Brownstone Institute: https://brownstone.org/articles/anatomy-of-the-administrative-state/;
